[&>div]:group-hover:text-ink-gray-6",size:"sm",title:`Created by ${t.page.owner}`},null,8,["label","title"]),p(s(X),{options:[{label:"Duplicate",onClick:()=>s(a).duplicatePage(t.page),icon:"copy"},{label:"View in Desk",onClick:()=>s(a).openInDesk(t.page),icon:"arrow-up-right"},{label:"Delete",onClick:()=>s(a).deletePage(t.page),icon:"trash"}],size:"sm",placement:"right"},{default:v(({open:r})=>[p(m,{name:"more-horizontal",class:"h-4 w-4 font-bold text-ink-gray-6",onClick:r},null,8,["onClick"])]),_:1},8,["options"])])],2)]),_:1},8,["to"])}}}),ae={mounted(b,a){let t;b.addEventListener("mousedown",()=>{t=setTimeout(()=>{a.value()},300),document.addEventListener("mouseup",()=>{clearTimeout(t)},{once:!0})})}},Ft={class:"flex h-screen flex-col"},Vt={class:"toolbar sticky top-0 z-10 flex h-12 items-center justify-between border-b-[1px] border-outline-gray-1 bg-surface-white p-2 px-3 py-1",ref:"toolbar"},Bt={class:"flex items-center"},St={class:"flex cursor-pointer items-center gap-2"},It=e("img",{src:we,alt:"logo",class:"h-7"},null,-1),Dt=e("h1",{class:"text-md mt-[2px] font-semibold leading-5 text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-200"}," Builder ",-1),Mt={class:"flex w-full flex-1 overflow-hidden"},Pt={class:"flex-1 overflow-auto"},At={class:"m-auto mb-32 flex h-fit w-3/4 max-w-6xl flex-col pt-5"},Nt={class:"sticky top-0 z-20 mb-8 flex items-center justify-between bg-surface-white px-3 py-5"},Zt={class:"text-xl font-semibold text-ink-gray-9"},Ht={class:"flex gap-2"},Ut={class:"relative flex"},jt={class:"max-md:hidden"},Tt={class:"max-sm:hidden"},Et={class:"max-md:hidden"},Ot={key:0,class:"col-span-full"},Gt=e("p",{class:"mt-4 px-3 text-base text-gray-500"},` You don't have any pages yet. Click on the "+ New" button to create a new page. `,-1),qt=[Gt],Kt={key:1,class:"col-span-full"},Rt=e("p",{class:"mt-4 text-base text-gray-500"},"No matching pages found.",-1),Yt=[Rt],Jt={key:2,class:"grid-col grid gap-3 auto-fill-[220px]"},Qt={key:3},tl=S({__name:"PageBuilderDashboard",setup(b){const a=me({attribute:"data-theme"}),t=ge(a),c=K(),m=se("displayType","grid"),d=L(!1),r=L(""),g=L(""),u=se("orderBy","creation"),_={creation:"creation desc",modified:"modified desc",alphabetically_a_z:"page_title asc",alphabetically_z_a:"page_title desc"},l=L(new Set),y=L(!1);fe(()=>{J.capture("builder_dashboard_page_visited")}),he(()=>c.activeFolder,()=>T()),be(document,"keydown",f=>{f.key==="Escape"&&(l.value.clear(),y.value=!1)});const T=()=>{const f={is_template:0};g.value&&(g.value==="published"?f.published=!0:g.value==="unpublished"?f.published=!1:g.value==="draft"&&(f.draft_blocks=["is","set"]));const n={};r.value&&(n.page_title=["like",`%${r.value}%`],n.route=["like",`%${r.value}%`]),c.activeFolder&&(f.project_folder=c.activeFolder),$.update({filters:f,orFilters:n,orderBy:_[u.value]}),$.fetch()},de=()=>{$.next()},R=L(!1),ee=(f,n)=>{if(y.value){if(f.preventDefault(),f.stopPropagation(),R.value){R.value=!1;return}if(f.shiftKey){const F=$.data||[],V=l.value.size?F.find(I=>I.name===Array.from(l.value)[0]):null;if(V){const I=F.indexOf(V),A=F.indexOf(n),E=Math.min(I,A),O=Math.max(I,A);for(let i=E;i<=O;i++){const H=F[i];l.value.add(H.name)}}}else f.ctrlKey||f.metaKey||l.value.clear(),Y(n)}else J.capture("builder_page_opened",{page_name:n.page_name})},te=f=>{y.value=!0,R.value=!0,Y(f)},Y=f=>{l.value.has(f.name)?l.value.delete(f.name):l.value.add(f.name),l.value.size||(y.value=!1)};_e([r,g,u],T,{debounce:300,immediate:!0});const ue=f=>le(this,null,function*(){oe({method:"POST",url:"builder.api.update_page_folder"}).submit({pages:Array.from(l.value),folder_name:f}).then(()=>{var n;for(const F of l.value){const V=(n=$.data)==null?void 0:n.find(I=>I.name===F);V&&(V.project_folder=f)}l.value.clear(),y.value=!1,d.value=!1,c.activeFolder=f})}),Z=L(!1);return(f,n)=>{var E,O;const F=w("FeatherIcon"),V=w("BuilderButton"),I=w("router-link"),A=w("BuilderInput");return o(),h("div",Ft,[e("div",Vt,[e("div",null,[p(W,{modelValue:Z.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":n[1]||(n[1]=i=>Z.value=i),style:{"z-index":"40"},class:"[&>div>div[id^=headlessui-dialog-panel]]:my-3",options:{title:"Settings",size:"5xl"}},{body:v(()=>[p(ke,{onClose:n[0]||(n[0]=i=>Z.value=!1),onlyGlobal:!0})]),_:1},8,["modelValue"]),e("div",Bt,[p(s(X),{options:[{group:"Builder",hideLabel:!0,items:[{label:"New Page",onClick:()=>f.$router.push({name:"builder",params:{pageId:"new"}}),icon:"plus"}]},{group:"Options",hideLabel:!0,items:[{label:"Apps",component:Me,icon:"grid"},{label:"Toggle Theme",onClick:()=>s(t)(),icon:s(a)?"sun":"moon"},{label:"Toggle Sidebar",onClick:()=>s(c).showDashboardSidebar=!s(c).showDashboardSidebar,icon:"sidebar"},{label:"Settings",onClick:()=>Z.value=!0,icon:"settings"}]},{group:"Help",hideLabel:!0,items:[{label:"Help",onClick:()=>{f.window.open("https://t.me/frappebuilder")},icon:"info"}]}],size:"sm",class:"flex-1 [&>div>div>div]:w-full",placement:"right"},{default:v(({open:i})=>[e("div",St,[It,Dt,p(F,{name:i?"chevron-up":"chevron-down",class:"h-4 w-4 !text-gray-700 dark:!text-gray-200"},null,8,["name"])])]),_:1},8,["options"])])]),p(I,{to:{name:"builder",params:{pageId:"new"}},onClick:n[2]||(n[2]=()=>{s(J).capture("builder_new_page_created")})},{default:v(()=>[p(V,{variant:"solid",iconLeft:"plus",class:"bg-surface-gray-7 !text-ink-white hover:bg-surface-gray-6"},{default:v(()=>[C(" New ")]),_:1})]),_:1})],512),e("div",Mt,[B(p(Xe,{onOpenSettings:n[3]||(n[3]=i=>Z.value=!0)},null,512),[[M,s(c).showDashboardSidebar]]),e("div",Pt,[e("section",At,[e("div",Nt,[e("h1",Zt,k(s(c).activeFolder||"All Pages"),1),e("div",Ht,[e("div",null,[B(p(V,{variant:"solid",onClick:n[4]||(n[4]=i=>d.value=!0)},{default:v(()=>[C(" Move To Folder ")]),_:1},512),[[M,y.value&&l.value.size]])]),B(e("div",Ut,[p(A,{class:"w-48",type:"text",placeholder:"Filter by title or route",modelValue:r.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":n[5]||(n[5]=i=>r.value=i),autofocus:"",onInput:n[6]||(n[6]=i=>{r.value=i})},{prefix:v(()=>[p(F,{name:"search",class:"size-4 text-ink-gray-5"})]),_:1},8,["modelValue"])],512),[[M,!y.value]]),B(e("div",jt,[p(A,{type:"select",class:"w-24",modelValue:g.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":n[7]||(n[7]=i=>g.value=i),options:[{label:"All",value:""},{label:"Draft",value:"draft"},{label:"Published",value:"published"},{label:"Unpublished",value:"unpublished"}]},null,8,["modelValue"])],512),[[M,!y.value]]),B(e("div",Tt,[p(A,{type:"select",class:"w-32",modelValue:s(u),"onUpdate:modelValue":n[8]||(n[8]=i=>G(u)?u.value=i:null),options:[{label:"Sort",value:"",disabled:!0},{label:"Last Created",value:"creation"},{label:"Last Modified",value:"modified"},{label:"Alphabetically (A-Z)",value:"alphabetically_a_z"},{label:"Alphabetically (Z-A)",value:"alphabetically_z_a"}]},null,8,["modelValue"])],512),[[M,!y.value]]),e("div",Et,[p(ye,{class:"[&>div]:min-w-0",options:[{label:"Grid",value:"grid",icon:"grid",hideLabel:!0},{label:"List",value:"list",icon:"list",hideLabel:!0}],modelValue:s(m),"onUpdate:modelValue":n[9]||(n[9]=i=>G(m)?m.value=i:null)},null,8,["modelValue"])])])]),e("div",null,[!((E=s($).data)!=null&&E.length)&&!r.value&&!g.value?(o(),h("div",Ot,qt)):(O=s($).data)!=null&&O.length?P("",!0):(o(),h("div",Kt,Yt)),s(m)==="grid"?(o(),h("div",Jt,[(o(!0),h(N,null,j(s($).data,i=>B((o(),z(it,{selected:l.value.has(i.name),onClickCapture:H=>ee(H,i),key:i.page_name,page:i},null,8,["selected","onClickCapture","page"])),[[s(ae),()=>te(i)]])),128))])):P("",!0),s(m)==="list"?(o(),h("div",Qt,[(o(!0),h(N,null,j(s($).data,i=>B((o(),z(zt,{onClickCapture:H=>ee(H,i),selected:l.value.has(i.name),key:i.page_name,page:i},null,8,["onClickCapture","selected","page"])),[[s(ae),()=>te(i)]])),128))])):P("",!0)]),B(p(V,{class:"m-auto mt-12 w-fit text-sm",onClick:de,variant:"subtle",size:"sm"},{default:v(()=>[C(" Load More ")]),_:1},512),[[M,s($).hasNextPage]])])])]),p(tt,{modelValue:d.value,"onUpdate:modelValue":n[10]||(n[10]=i=>d.value=i),currentFolder:s(c).activeFolder,onFolderSelected:ue},null,8,["modelValue","currentFolder"])])}}});export{tl as default};
//# sourceMappingURL=PageBuilderDashboard-CATDDLJE.js.map
